contest and prediction market contract  This contract merges Escrow (Layer 1) and PredictionMarket (Layer 2) into a single contract:  Layer 1 (Contestants): - Contestants deposit fixed amount to enter - Oracle distributes prizes based on results - Winners claim their payouts  Layer 2 (Spectators): - Spectators predict on contestants using LMSR pricing - 15% entry fee augments Layer 1 prizes and pays contestant bonuses - Winner-take-all redemption based on Layer 1 results - Can withdraw before settlement (full refund with deferred fees)  Key Innovation: ONE oracle call (`settleContest()`) settles both layers!","errors":{"ERC1155InsufficientBalance(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates an error related to the current `balance` of a `sender`. Used in transfers.","params":{"balance":"Current balance for the interacting account.","needed":"Minimum amount required to perform a transfer.","sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred.","tokenId":"Identifier number of a token."}}],"ERC1155InvalidApprover(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"approver":"Address initiating an approval operation."}}],"ERC1155InvalidArrayLength(uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates an array length mismatch between ids and values in a safeBatchTransferFrom operation. Used in batch transfers.","params":{"idsLength":"Length of the array of token identifiers","valuesLength":"Length of the array of token amounts"}}],"ERC1155InvalidOperator(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `operator` to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"operator":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner."}}],"ERC1155InvalidReceiver(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.","params":{"receiver":"Address to which tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC1155InvalidSender(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.","params":{"sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC1155MissingApprovalForAll(address,address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `operator`\u2019s approval. Used in transfers.","params":{"operator":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.","owner":"Address of the current owner of a token."}}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` grants or revokes permission to `operator` to transfer their tokens, according to `approved`."},"TransferBatch(address,address,address,uint256[],uint256[])":{"details":"Equivalent to multiple {TransferSingle} events, where `operator`, `from` and `to` are the same for all transfers."},"TransferSingle(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `value` amount of tokens of type `id` are transferred from `from` to `to` by `operator`."},"URI(string,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when the URI for token type `id` changes to `value`, if it is a non-programmatic URI. If an {URI} event was emitted for `id`, the standard https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata-extensions[guarantees] that `value` will equal the value returned by {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addPrediction(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Uses LMSR pricing - popular contestants cost more","params":{"amount":"Amount of payment token to deposit","outcomeId":"Index of contestant to predict on"}},"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOf}."},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length."},"calculateOutcomePrice(uint256)":{"params":{"outcomeId":"The contestant to get price for"},"returns":{"_0":"Current price per token"}},"cancelContest()":{"details":"Cannot cancel after settlement - settlement is final"},"claimPredictionPayout(uint256)":{"params":{"outcomeId":"The outcome to claim"}},"closePredictions()":{"details":"Prevents last-second predictions when outcome is nearly certain  Use case: Close predictions when final round starts, before results are known This prevents unfair late predictions and potential race conditions"},"constructor":{"params":{"_contestantDepositAmount":"Fixed amount each contestant must deposit","_demandSensitivityBps":"LMSR price sensitivity parameter","_expiryTimestamp":"When contest expires (for refunds)","_liquidityParameter":"LMSR curve parameter","_oracle":"Address that controls contest lifecycle","_oracleFeeBps":"Oracle fee as basis points","_paymentToken":"ERC20 token used for deposits and payouts"}},"distributeExpiredContest()":{"details":"Can only be called after expiryTimestamp has passed  This function distributes all unclaimed winnings to their rightful owners: - Pushes unclaimed contestant payouts - Pushes unclaimed spectator payouts (winners only)  Use case: Users forgot to claim or lost access to accounts. After expiry, oracle can force distribution to prevent funds being locked forever."},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-isApprovedForAll}."},"joinContest()":{"details":"Must deposit exact contestantDepositAmount"},"leaveContest()":{"details":"Works in OPEN state (before contest starts) or CANCELLED state (full refund)"},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeBatchTransferFrom}."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeTransferFrom}."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-setApprovalForAll}."},"settleContest(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"ONE call does everything!","params":{"payoutBps":"Array of payout basis points (must sum to 10000)","winners":"Array of winner addresses in order"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"uri(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the ERC]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\\{id\\}` substring with the actual token type ID."},"withdrawPrediction(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Works in: - OPEN state (during registration) - ACTIVE state (before predictions lock) - CANCELLED state (full refund anytime)","params":{"outcomeId":"Which outcome to withdraw from","tokenAmount":"Amount of tokens to burn "}}},"title":"Contest","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"BPS_DENOMINATOR()":{"notice":"Denominator for basis point calculations"},"PRICE_PRECISION()":{"notice":"Price precision for LMSR calculations"},"SPECTATOR_ENTRY_FEE_BPS()":{"notice":"Entry fee for spectators in basis points (e.g., 1500 = 15%)"},"accumulatedPrizeBonus()":{"notice":"Accumulated prize bonus to augment Layer 1 pool"},"activateContest()":{"notice":"Oracle activates the contest (closes contestant registration, predictions continue)"},"addPrediction(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Spectator adds a prediction by refunds"},"cancelExpired()":{"notice":"Anyone can cancel if expired and not settled"},"claimContestPayout()":{"notice":"Contestant claims their contest payout after settlement"},"claimPredictionPayout(uint256)":{"notice":"Spectator claims their prediction payout (winner-take-all)"},"closePredictions()":{"notice":"Oracle closes predictions before contest ends"},"constructor":{"notice":"Constructor initializes the contest"},"contestantBonuses(address)":{"notice":"Bonuses earned by each contestant from prediction volume"},"contestantDepositAmount()":{"notice":"Fixed deposit amount for contestants"},"contestants(uint256)":{"notice":"Array of contestant addresses"},"demandSensitivityBps()":{"notice":"Demand sensitivity in basis points - controls LMSR price curve steepness"},"distributeExpiredContest()":{"notice":"Distribute all unclaimed winnings after contest expires"},"expiryTimestamp()":{"notice":"Timestamp when contest expires (for refunds)"},"finalContestantPayouts(address)":{"notice":"Final payouts for each contestant after settlement"},"isContestant(address)":{"notice":"Mapping to check if address is a contestant"},"isSpectator(address)":{"notice":"Mapping to check if address is a forceClose iteration)"},"totalContestantDeposits()":{"notice":"Total contestant deposits collected"},"totalSpectatorCollateral()":{"notice":"Total collateral from spectators (85% of deposits)"},"totalVolumeOnContestant(address)":{"notice":"Total prediction volume on each contestant (for transparency)"},"withdrawPrediction(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Spectator withdraws their addPrediction(uint256,uint256).details: Uses LMSR pricing - popular contestants cost more

params.amount: Amount of payment token to deposit
params.outcomeId: Index of contestant to predict on

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

params.outcomeId: The contestant to get price for

cancelContest().details: Cannot cancel after settlement - settlement is final

closePredictions().details: Prevents last-second predictions when outcome is nearly certain  Use case: Close predictions when final round starts, before results are known This prevents unfair late predictions and potential race conditions

params._contestantDepositAmount: Fixed amount each contestant must deposit
params._paymentToken: ERC20 token used for deposits and payouts

distributeExpiredContest().details: Can only be called after expiryTimestamp has passed  This function distributes all unclaimed winnings to their rightful owners: - Pushes unclaimed contestant payouts - Pushes unclaimed spectator payouts (winners only)  Use case: Users forgot to claim or lost access to accounts. After expiry, oracle can force distribution to prevent funds being locked forever.

leaveContest().details: Works in OPEN state (before contest starts) or CANCELLED state (full refund)

params.payoutBps: Array of payout basis points (must sum to 10000)
params.winners: Array of winner addresses in order

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the ERC]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.

withdrawPrediction(uint256,uint256).details: Works in: - OPEN state (during registration) - ACTIVE state (before predictions lock) - CANCELLED state (full refund anytime)

SPECTATOR_ENTRY_FEE_BPS().notice: Entry fee for spectators in basis points (e.g., 1500 = 15%)

accumulatedPrizeBonus().notice: Accumulated prize bonus to augment Layer 1 pool

activateContest().notice: Oracle activates the contest (closes contestant registration, predictions continue)

addPrediction(uint256,uint256).notice: Spectator adds a prediction by predicting on a specific contestant

calculateOutcomePrice(uint256).notice: Calculate current LMSR price for an outcome

cancelExpired().notice: Anyone can cancel if expired and not settled

claimContestPayout().notice: Contestant claims their contest payout after settlement

closePredictions().notice: Oracle closes predictions before contest ends

contestantBonuses(address).notice: Bonuses earned by each contestant from prediction volume

demandSensitivityBps().notice: Demand sensitivity in basis points - controls LMSR price curve steepness

distributeExpiredContest().notice: Distribute all unclaimed winnings after contest expires

finalContestantPayouts(address).notice: Final payouts for each contestant after settlement

isContestant(address).notice: Mapping to check if address is a contestant

isSpectator(address).notice: Mapping to check if address is a spectator

joinContest().notice: Contestant joins the contest by depositing required amount

leaveContest().notice: Contestant leaves contest and withdraws deposit

liquidityParameter().notice: LMSR liquidity parameter - controls price curve steepness

netPosition(uint256).notice: Track net position for each outcome (for LMSR pricing and total supply)

oracle().notice: Address of the oracle that controls contest state

paymentToken().notice: The payment token used for deposits and payouts

settleContest(address[],uint256[]).notice: Oracle settles contest - distributes Layer 1 prizes and resolves Layer 2 market

spectatorMarketResolved().notice: Flag indicating if spectator market has been resolved

spectatorTotalDeposited(address).notice: Track total payment tokens deposited by each spectator (for withdrawals)

spectatorWinningOutcome().notice: Winning outcome ID after settlement (for winner-take-all)

spectators(uint256).notice: Array of spectator addresses (for forceClose iteration)

totalSpectatorCollateral().notice: Total collateral from spectators (85% of deposits)

totalVolumeOnContestant(address).notice: Total prediction volume on each contestant (for transparency)

withdrawPrediction(uint256,uint256).notice: Spectator withdraws their prediction (burns tokens, gets 100% refund)
